overview: "Quiet Beatle" George Harrison gets the full treatment -- one befitting his status as a legendary songwriter and musician -- in this stunning collection. From his childhood in Liverpool to his meteoric rise to fame with The Beatles and subsequent brilliant solo career, George's life is exhaustively chronicled. It's all here: the highs, lows, excesses and fame. Features rare archival footage gleaned from private collections around the world.
title: George Harrison Music Box Collection
